dcterms:description: The ASW dataset consists of 30.9 hours of face tracks from 212 YouTube videos, including debates, press conferences, talk shows, etc. The length of face tracks ranges from 0.2 to 233.0 seconds. There is no dubbed video in the ASW dataset.
dcterms:title: Active Speakers in the Wild (ASW)

dcterms:creator: Joseph Roth
Sourish Chaudhuri
Ondrej Klejch
Radhika Marvin
dcterms:description: The AVA dataset is derived from 188 movies around the world. Each movie is annotated from 15 minutes to 30 minutes with face bounding boxes, entities, and speaking labels. They are human-annotated with ASD labels at the frame level. There are some dubbed movies in the dataset, and speakers that were active in the original videos are also labeled as active in the dubbed versions.
dcterms:title: AVA-Active Speaker (AVA)
